monsters.name: Ancient Skeleton
monsters.description: The remains of an ancient warrior, still guarding this place.
monsters.interaction_message: The skeleton's bones rattle as it turns to face you, weapon raised.

monsters.name: Wild Centaur
monsters.description: A powerful centaur warrior, half-human and half-horse.
monsters.interaction_message: The centaur stamps its hooves and eyes you with suspicion.

monsters.name: Ancient Dragon
monsters.description: A mighty dragon, ancient and powerful beyond measure.
monsters.interaction_message: The dragon's eyes glow with ancient intelligence as smoke curls from its nostrils.

monsters.name: Fierce Minotaur
monsters.description: A towering minotaur with massive horns and rippling muscles.
monsters.interaction_message: The minotaur bellows a challenge, pawing at the ground menacingly.

monsters.name: Stone Golem
monsters.description: A massive golem constructed from ancient stone and magic.
monsters.interaction_message: The golem's stone body grinds and creaks as it slowly turns toward you.
